class SVGTree.BranchDecoratorHorizontalAboveBelow(tree, decorator1, decorator2, *args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: SVGTree.BranchDecoratorHorizontalBranchLength

branch decorator - displays two branch values.

One decorator is displayed above and the the other one below the branch. The branch itself is rendered as a horizontal line.

getText(node_id)¶

return text.

setFontSize(size)¶

set font size.

class SVGTree.NodeDecorator(tree, plot_label=False, plot_symbol=None)¶

class for decorating nodes.

The default decorator does nothing. It implements the methods to plot symbols. Symbol choices are

  • square
  • circle
getLegend(x, y)¶

add legend. returns elements and maximum x and y output.

class SVGTree.NodeDecoratorExternal(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: SVGTree.NodeDecorator

class for decorating external nodes. Simply write name.

getLegend(x, y)¶

add legend. returns elements and maximum x and y output.

class SVGTree.NodeDecoratorBySpecies(tree, plot_label=None, plot_symbol=None, extract_species=<type 'str'>, map_species2colour=None, map_species2name=None, map_taxon2url=None, *args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: SVGTree.NodeDecorator

class for decorating external nodes.

Colour by species and rename.

colours are a ‘,’-separated tuples of RGB values.

getLegend(x, y)¶

add legend. returns elements and maximum x and y output.
